hints.content: Drag the tallest line all the way to the left.
Now drag the rest of the lines into place.

These lines are in order from tallest to shortest:

![](static/khan/assets/edaa9c8f0196a8d87ce24144a77074953c081258.png)

question.content:
**Drag the lines left or right.**

**Order them from tallest to shortest.**  

*Put the **tallest** line on the **left**.*
 
[[☃ sorter 1]]
